title: Transformative Marketing Education: Sociocultural Practice-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environments, formative assessment-driven operations, and marketing competencies addressing technological, environmental, and societal changes

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world marketing cases and create campaign proposals considering social impact.
Learners can iteratively revise and improve digital marketing strategies based on peer feedback.
Learners can solve simulation tasks using a sustainability- and collaboration-focused marketing decision-making framework.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
